StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateSMCRAc.va.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @ContractID int, @SMCRAc.vated char(1), @SMCRActDate date.me, @SMCRDeactDate date.me, @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SMCR] WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[SMCR] SET [ACTIVATED] = @SMCRAc.vated ,[ACTIVATED_DATE] = @SMCRActDate ,[DEACTIVATED_DATE] = @SMCRDeactDate ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID END ELSE BEGIN IF(@SMCRAc.vated IS NOT NULL OR @SMCRActDate IS NOT NULL OR @SMCRDeactDate IS NOT NULL) INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[dbo].[SMCR] ([CONTRACT_ID] ,[ACTIVATED] ,[ACTIVATED_DATE] ,[DEACTIVATED_DATE] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@ContractID ,@SMCRAc.vated ,@SMCRActDate ,@SMCRDeactDate ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate()) END
